text: Vic Darchinyan (, born January 7, 1976, in Vanadzor, Armenia) is the former IBF flyweight champion. He is a left-handed boxer who currently trains under Billy Hussein, brother of boxers Nedal and Hussein Hussein. He was previously trained by former three-division world champion Jeff Fenech in Sydney, Australia. == Other websites == *Official website *Vic Darchinyan's career record Category:Armenian boxers Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Australian boxers
title: Vic Darchinyan
